qas.question: In what year did SME merge with another company?
What was the name of the other company that SME merged with?
What did the company call themselves after the  merger?
In what year did Sony BMG Music Entertainment go back to being called SME?
In 2014, SME and Bertelsmann Music Group merged as what?
In 2018, Sony BMG reverted to what name?
The 2008 buyout led to the dissolution of SME, which relaunched as what?
Brickman Music Group merged with SME in what year?
BMG Rights Music was relaunched in what year?

context: In <a0_0><b7_0>2004<b7_0/><a0_0/>, SME and <a1_0>Bertelsmann Music Group<a1_0/> merged as <a2_0><b4_0>Sony BMG Music Entertainment<b4_0/><a2_0/>. When Sony acquired BMG's half of the conglomerate in <a3_0><b8_0>2008<b8_0/><a3_0/>, Sony BMG reverted to the <b5_0>SME<b5_0/> name. The buyout led to the dissolution of BMG, which then relaunched as <b6_0>BMG Rights Management<b6_0/>. Out of the "Big Three" record companies, with Universal Music Group being the largest and Warner Music Group, SME is middle-sized.
